Author: Snowy
Name: Eureka Helper
Punchline: Eureka Tracker in a plugin with QoL features
Description:
A tool to assist you on your Eureka adventures. Type /eurekahelper to get started.
Features include:
- In-Game Tracker GUI
- Instance Tracker
- Elementals Tracker
- Relic Helper
- Alarms
- Money NM weather times
- More to come
